pr_title: [FLINK-19946][Connectors / HBase]Support sink parallelism configuration for Hbase connector

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change Defines the parallelism of the Hbase sink operator. By default, the parallelism is determined by the framework using the same parallelism of the upstream chained operator. Defines the parallelism of the HBase sink operator. By default, the parallelism is determined by the framework using the same parallelism of the upstream chained operator.
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -162,6 +162,13 @@ Connector Options can be set to '0' with the flush interval set allowing for complete async processing of buffered actions. + +
sink.parallelism
+ optional + (none) + Integer + Defines the parallelism of the Hbase sink operator. By default, the parallelism is determined by the framework using the same parallelism of the upstream chained operator.

timeline.bodyText: Suggested change 为 Hbase sink operator 定义并行度。默认情况下，并行度由框架决定，和链在一起的上游 operator 一样。 为 HBase sink operator 定义并行度。默认情况下，并行度由框架决定，和链在一起的上游 operator 一样。
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,6 +155,13 @@ ON myTopic.key = hTable.rowkey; 写入的参数选项。刷写缓存行的间隔。它能提升写入 HBase 数据库的性能，但是也可能增加延迟。设置为 "0" 关闭此选项。注意："sink.buffer-flush.max-size" 和 "sink.buffer-flush.max-rows" 同时设置为 "0"，刷写选项整个异步处理缓存行为。 + +
sink.parallelism
+ 可选 + (none) + Integer + 为 Hbase sink operator 定义并行度。默认情况下，并行度由框架决定，和链在一起的上游 operator 一样。

timeline.message:
[FLINK-19946][hbase] Add sink parallelism option for HBase connector

This closes #13933

[FLINK-19946][hbase] Add sink parallelism option for HBase connector

This closes #13933
